{
    common: {
      - follow: false
        setting1: Value 1
      + setting2: 200
      - setting3: null
      + setting3: true
      - setting4: blah blah
      - setting5: {
            key5: value5
        }
        setting6: {
            doge: {
              - wow: so much
              + wow:
            }
            key: value
          - ops: vops
        }
    }
    group1: {
      - baz: bars
      + baz: bas
        foo: bar
      - nest: str
      + nest: {
          key: value
        }
    }
  + group2: {
        abc: 12345
        deep: {
            id: 45
        }
    }
  - group3: {
        deep: {
            id: {
                number: 45
            }
        }
        fee: 100500
    }
}
